post.body: Chips and dip
How crazy?
Took turkey out of frig. Bag was leaking. Bloody mess in frig. That, plus smoke thing, is 2 for today. Things come in 3s. What next?
Was browning bread 4 dressing. Turned timer off but not brown enough. Left 4 another few minutes. Forgot! 1hr later smoke coming from oven
Thank goodness 4 conveneince store opened today. Didn't have bread 4 cornbread dressing. Then paid at store and almost walked out without it
Merry Christmas to everyone!! Busy cooking 2day. Fmly coming 4 dinner. Mom spending the night. You know what that means. I need prayer!!!
Yucky humid weather. Doesn't fee like Christmas in Louisiana. I'll be cooking today and tomorrow. Working right now getting payroll done.
Yes. Haven't u heard of it???
Really busy weekend. I'm tired.
Busy day today. Worked on Cmas blankets this afternoon. Then ad to help serve gumgo to 120 Cmas Carolers. Then worked on Cmas blankets.
finished painting yesterday. Also helped friend with Christmas blankets for three grandkids.
Been painting at church since exercise class this morning. Need to do second coat. Paint not drying due to humidity.
Going to try to drag myself to exercise class this morning. Feeling lazy but energy will kick in when I get there.
Good web site to understand @replies http://tinyurl.com/6j6ufs
Tried new coffee at party last night. Great coffee. Fresh ground from coffee beans. Came from this web site http://tinyurl.com/2nfk44
Fun Christmas party last night. Ate too much good food.
Friend got everything fixed. Looks much better!
Frowny face. My logo didn't work.
I have a GREAT friend who designed my new user logo. Check it out!!!
Mmmmm..........just ate a delicious juicy Pear from Harry and David.
